name: Candy Block Puzzle
description:
Candy Block Puzzle is a classic block style puzzle game, an addictive block puzzle. 
The goal is to drag pieces to board and fill up all grids & gain score!
It comes with no difficulties ranging every one from Beginner to Expert can play & there are unlimited levels in total.

The objective of the game is to form lines vertically and/or horizontally on the board using the candy block pieces. 

Each time you form a line, the existing candy blocks within that column or row crash.

The candy block pieces cannot be rotated - only can be placed on the board by dragging them with your finger to fit another candy.
Happy Puzzle! Don't forget to compare your score with friends!
